uk.ac.ebi.mdk.tool.domain
Class MolecularHashFactory

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.ebi.mdk.tool.domain.MolecularHashFactory

public class MolecularHashFactory
extends Object

MolecularHashFactory - 2011.11.09
Factory of generating MolecularHash objects. The main method here is getHash(IAtomContainer) that can be tuned with different AtomSeeds. The default AtomSeeds can be altered using addSeedMethod(AtomSeed) and setSeedMethods(Set). Seeds are generated in the SeedFactory.

Version:
$Rev$ : Last Changed $Date$
Author:
johnmay, $Author$ (this version)

Method Detail

getInstance

public static MolecularHashFactory getInstance()

getSeedMethods

public Collection<AtomSeed> getSeedMethods()
Access the list of seed methods. This Set is unmodifiable and new seeds should be added using addSeedMethod(AtomSeed) or setting the seeds with setSeedMethods(Set).

The default seeds are currently AtomicNumberSeed and ConnectedAtomSeed

Returns:
The set of current seeds

addSeedMethod

public boolean addSeedMethod(AtomSeed seed)
Allows addition of new seeds to the hash factory. New seeds will alter the specificity of of the hash code to suite certain tasks. An example would be to generate a hash code that incorporates the stereo-chemical properties using the uk.ac.ebi.core.tools.hash.seeds.StereoSeed.

Example 

 MolecularHashFactory factory = MolecularHashFactory.getInstance();
 factory.addSeedMethod(SeedFactory.getInstance().getSeed(StereoSeed.class));

Parameters:
seed - New AtomSeed to add
Returns:
Whether the new seed was added (false if it is already present)

setSeedMethods

public void setSeedMethods(Collection<AtomSeed> seedMethods)
Sets the seed method set for using the hashing algorithm. This will override all current seeds with the new seed and all subsequent calls to getHash(IAtomContainer) will be affected.

Parameters:
seedMethods - The new seed methods

getHash

public MolecularHash getHash(org.openscience.cdk.interfaces.IAtomContainer molecule)
Generates a hash code for the molecule with default seeds. The default seeds are currently AtomicNumberSeed and ConnectedAtomSeed. These can be modified using the setSeedMethods(Set) and addSeedMethod(AtomSeed) methods.

Parameters:
molecule - the molecule to generate the hash for
Returns:
The hash for this molecule

getHash

public MolecularHash getHash(org.openscience.cdk.interfaces.IAtomContainer molecule,
                             Collection<AtomSeed> methods)
Generate a hash code with specified seeds. This method allows overriding of the default seeds for selected entries.

Parameters:
molecule - The molecule to generate the hash for
methods - The methods that will be used to generate the hash
Returns:
The hash for this molecule

setDepth

public void setDepth(int depth)
Sets the depth to recurse on each atom

Parameters:
depth -

setSeedWithMoleculeSize

public void setSeedWithMoleculeSize(boolean useMoleculeSize)
If set to true (default) the base seed will use the molecule size. This will not allow comparison of sub-graph hashes. To allow sub-graph pseudo sub-graph matching MolecularHash.getSimilarity(MolecularHash) this should be set to false

Parameters:
useMoleculeSize -

getAtomSeeds

public int[] getAtomSeeds(org.openscience.cdk.interfaces.IAtomContainer molecule,
                          Collection<AtomSeed> methods)
Generates an array of atomic seed values for each atom in the molecule. These seeds are generated using the provided methods

Parameters:
molecule - the molecule to generate the seeds for
Returns:
array of integers representing the seeds for each atom in the molecule

rotate

public static int rotate(int seed,
                         int rotation)
Rotates the seed using xor shift (pseudo random number generation) the specified number of times.

Parameters:
seed - the starting seed
rotation - Number of xor rotations to perform
Returns:
The starting seed rotated the specified number of times

rotate

Rotates the seed if the seed has already been seen in the provided occurrences map
